description:
Flatpak 1.16 Linux application sandboxing and distribution framework is now available for download. This is a major release that brings several new features and improvements.

The post Flatpak 1.16 Linux App Sandboxing and Distribution Framework Officially Released appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Flatpak 1.16 Linux App Sandboxing and Distribution Framework Officially Released

description:
KDE Plasma 6.3 desktop environment is now available for public beta testing with many new features and improvements. Here’s what to expect in the final release!

title: KDE Plasma 6.3 Is Now Available for Public Beta Testing, Here’s What’s New

description:
KDE Frameworks 6.10 open-source software suite is now available with support for convert between "rack units" and other units of length, as well as other improvements.

The post KDE Frameworks 6.10 Adds Support for Converting Between “Rack Units” in KRunner appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KDE Frameworks 6.10 Adds Support for Converting Between “Rack Units” in KRunner

description:
KDE Gear 24.12.1 is now available as the first maintenance update to the latest KDE Gear 24.12 open-source software suite series with fixes for various KDE applications.

title: KDE Gear 24.12.1 Is Out to Improve Dolphin, Kate, NeoChat, and Other KDE Apps

description:
Tails 6.11 amnesic incognito live system distribution is now available for download with support for detecting partitioning errors and fixes for critical vulnerabilities.

title: Tails 6.11 Anonymous Linux OS Released with Critical Security Fixes

description:
